titles.title: A bill to repeal section 154 of title 23, United States Code, relating to the national maximum speed limit, and to provide that the States should establish maximum speed limits.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
Referred to Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Repeals the national maximum speed limit of 55 miles per hour. Expresses the sense of the Congress that the States should not establish a maximum speed limit exceeding: (1) 55 miles per hour on public highways in urbanized areas; and (2) 70 miles per hour on any other public highways.
